quote: Ultimately, you need to understand that the power of white space comes from the limits of human attention and memory.
author: Jerry Cao, Kamil Zieba, Matt Ellis
title: Why White Space Is Crucial To UX Design

quote: We go out and observe people and from that we say 'Oh, we have some ideas.' Then you prototype your solution and test it. Quite often, these are wrong at first, but each time we go around the circle we do a better job until the point that we're making something that really works
author: Donald Norman
title: It's not you. Bad doors are everywhere.

quote: When I look at something, I should be able to discover what operations I can do. Discoverability, when It's not there... well you don't know how to use something.
author: Donald Norman
title: It's not you. Bad doors are everywhere

quote: Experience is what you get when you didn't get what you wanted. And experience is often the most valuable thing you have to offer.
author: Randy Pausch
title: The Last Lecture

quote: When you're screwing up and nobody says anything to you anymore, that means they've given up on you.
author: Randy Pausch
title: The Last Lecture

quote: The brick walls are not there to keep us out â€“ the brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
author: Randy Pausch
title: The Last Lecture
